T04D3976:256a-0: @256a * // tsha tsha gdab pa'i cho ga bzhugs //
T04D3976:256a-2: # // pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa'i tsha tsha gdab
T04D3976:256a-3: pa'i cho ga / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
T04D3976:256a-4: dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
T04D3976:256a-5: na mo bha ga ba te /
T04D3976:256a-6: bee ro tsa na pra bha r'a dz'a ya /
T04D3976:256a-8: aarha te sa mya ksam bu bdh'a ya /
T04D3976:256a-10: aom su kshme sa me sa ma ye sa ma te sa m'a ro po aa na bar ne /
T04D3976:256a-18: aa ti shth'a na aa dhi shtha te sv'a h'a /
T04D3976:256a-19: gzungs 'di 'jim ba'i gong bu'am bye ma'i gong bu
T04D3976:256a-20: la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas la mchod rten
T04D3976:256a-21: bya'o // mchod rten de la rdul phra rab kyi
T04D3976:256a-22: grangs ji snyed yod pa de snyed kyi mchod rten
T04D3976:256a-24: rdul phra rab grang ji snyed yod pa de snyed
T04D3976:256a-25: kyi lha dang mi rnams kyi skye ba phun sum
T04D3976:256a-27: gang dang gang du skyes pa na skye ba dran par 'gyur ro //
T04D3976:256a-28: myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
T04D3976:256a-29: pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya
T04D3976:256a-30: bar 'gyur ro // dang por 'jim pa brdung ba
T04D3976:256a-31: bdag gam gzhan yang rung bas byams pa dang snying
T04D3976:256a-32: rjes byang chub tu sems bskyed par bya zhing brdung
T04D3976:256a-33: bar 'gyur ro // ngo // de nas 'bi 'bi byin gyis brlab pa /
T04D3976:256a-34: 'og min nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snad mdzad 'od kyi rgyal po /
T04D3976:256a-35: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
T04D3976:256a-36: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs pa la phyag 'tshal bar
T04D3976:256a-37: bsam zhing / sngags kyi grangs gong ma bzhin du brjod do //
T04D3976:256a-38: de nas rten 'brel gyi sngags bzlas shing gdab po //
T04D3976:256a-39: de nas 'bru 'am me ton la rten 'brel gyi sngags lan gsum mam bdun bzlas la dbul lo //
T04D3976:256a-41: bsod nams 'di yis thams cad gzigs pa nyid //
T04D3976:256a-42: thob nas nyes pa'i dgra rnams pham byas te //
T04D3976:256a-43: rga nad 'chi ba'i dpa' klong 'khrugs pa yi //
T04D3976:256a-44: srid pa'i mtsho las 'gro ba 'don par shog / ces smon lam gdab po //
T04D3976:256b-0: @256b pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa'i s'a tstsha
T04D3976:256b-1: gdab pa'i cho ga / slob dpon mkhas pa chen
T04D3976:256b-2: po dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyi zhal snga
T04D3976:256b-5: // / ye dha rm'a he tu pra bha b'a he
T04D3976:256b-6: tu nte sh'a na ta th'a ga to hya ba
